CheckTitle: Ensure DLP Policies for Teams are Compliant
Description: Checks if DLP policies for Teams workload are enabled and apply to all Teams locations.
Risk: If DLP policies for Teams are not enabled or do not apply to all locations, sensitive data may be at risk of exposure.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Microsoft 365 compliance center (https://compliance.microsoft.com). 2. Under Solutions, select Data loss prevention. 3. Edit each DLP policy for Teams to ensure it is enabled and applies to all Teams locations.

Recommendation.Text: Enable DLP policies for Teams and ensure they apply to all Teams locations.

Notes: This check validates that DLP policies for Teams are enabled and apply to all Teams locations.
